fatigue_system.description: Simple 0-10 fatigue scale affecting combat performance and travel

0-2.name: Fresh
0-2.description: You feel energetic and ready for adventure

3-4.name: Tired
3-4.description: You're starting to feel the strain of travel

5-6.name: Weary
5-6.description: Your steps are heavy and reactions slower

7-8.name: Exhausted
7-8.description: Every step is a struggle, you start combat closer to enemies

9-10.name: Critically Fatigued
9-10.description: You can barely function and take damage from exhaustion

weight_encumbrance.description: Additional daily fatigue based on encumbrance level

travel_system.description: Environment-based travel with daily choices and resource management

travel_forward.description: Advance one day toward your destination

travel_back.description: Retreat one day back toward where you came from

rest.description: Spend the day resting to recover fatigue and health

rest_with_shelter.description: Rest in shelter for better fatigue recovery

forage.description: Search for food and resources instead of traveling

terrain_hazards.description: Daily random events that can delay travel

difficult_terrain.description: Rocky ground and obstacles slow your progress

bad_weather.description: Rain and wind force you to seek shelter

getting_lost.description: You lose your way and must backtrack

dangerous_wildlife.description: Predators force you to take a longer route
